sections.heading: Interim Session Legislative Committees and Commissions.
sections.text:
Committees and commissions of or appointed by the legislature, or either house thereof, may by resolution of the legislature, or either house thereof, perform and exercise such powers and authority in the interim between sessions of the legislature as shall be delegated to such committees or commissions in said resolution or resolutions.

History:1943, Act 167, Imd. Eff. Apr. 17, 1943 ;-- CL 1948, 4.221
